QuestData.Title: Loken's Lackeys
QuestData.Description: The attack on the Terrace of the Makers was not a half-hearted move on my brother's behalf. He sent a legion of iron dwarves and some of his most powerful lieutenants.$B$BUse the Horn of the Peaks to call the earthen to your side and defeat Loken's servants.$B$BYou'll find the giant, Eisenfaust, inside the Hall of the Shaper to the north. You'll find the others deeper inside the Terrace of the Makers, beyond the stairs to the northwest.
QuestData.LogDescription: Thorim wants you to slay Eisenfaust inside the Hall of the Shaper and Halefnir the Windborn and Duronn the Runeforged in the Terrace of the Makers.
QuestData.CompletionText: It's good to see you again, $n.
QuestData.RewardText: One by one, my brother's servants have fallen. Loken's insurrection will soon come to an end.
